Title: Arson suspected after massive fire at Apache Junction housing development
Summary: A massive fire at an Apache Junction housing development is suspected to be arson. Video from fire crews showed flames pouring from the site and heavy smoke in the area.

Title: Fire near Idaho Road and Tepee Street
Summary: The fire happened late Tuesday night near Idaho Road and Tepee Street, north of Superstition Boulevard around 11:30 p.m. No injuries were reported.

Title: Semi-trailer catches fire Thursday morning prompting the State Park Dr. off-ramp to close, now reopened; CHP
Summary: A semi-trailer caught fire on Thursday morning, leading to the closure of the State Park Dr. off-ramp. The ramp has since been reopened, according to the California Highway Patrol (CHP).
